example.title: Setting up a demo list
example.para: In this section, some examples will be provided to describe the functionality of pt_extlist. Before you can start, make sure, that pt_extlist is installed and loaded using Extension Manager. You will learn how to use pt_extlist by setting up a demo page using static tables provided in all TYPO3 installations.
Create a new page inside your page tree and open the template module. Include the following static templates that are provided with pt_extlist:
